sentences: Chris "Daddy" Dave is a drummer, composer, and bandleader from Houston, Texas.
Chris Dave was born in Houston, Texas and began his music career in the late 1980s.
Chris Dave blossomed on the drums, eventually graduating from Houston’s prestigious High School for the Performing and Visual Arts.
He studied at Howard University in Washington D.C. where he met acclaimed producers and former Prince associates Jimmy Jam and Terry Lewis.
This included a stint on Jill Scott's The Real Thing Tour in 2008.
